data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marquina, Daniel, Aguado, M. Teresa, Noreña, Carolina (2015): New records of Cotylea (Polycladida, Platyhelminthes) from Lizard Island, Great Barrier Reef, Australia, with remarks on the distribution of the Pseudoceros Lang, 1884 and Pseudobiceros Faubel, 1984 species of the Indo-Pacific Marine Region. Zootaxa 4019 (1): 354-377, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4019.1.14
